mapper.select: SELECT f.id, pf.profile_name, m.name FROM follow f, member m, profile pf WHERE f.id = m.id AND m.profile_no = pf.profile_no AND f.following = #{id}
SELECT m.id, m.name, pf.profile_name FROM member m, profile pf WHERE m.profile_no = pf.profile_no AND m.id in (SELECT following FROM follow WHERE id = #{id})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO follow (id, following, follower) VALUES (#{id}, #{following}, #{follower})
